Sentencas: A zero-emissions power plant with high efficiency is presented.
Titulo: High-Efficiency Power Production from Coal with Carbon Capture

Sentencas: Syngas, produced by the gasification of coal, is shifted to produce H-2 which in turn fuels stacks of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: High-Efficiency Power Production from Coal with Carbon Capture

Sentencas: Because the fuel cells maintain separate anode and cathode streams, air can be used as the oxygen source without diluting the fuel exhaust with nitrogen.
Titulo: High-Efficiency Power Production from Coal with Carbon Capture

Sentencas: This enables recovery of CO2 from the exhaust with a very small energy penalty.
Titulo: High-Efficiency Power Production from Coal with Carbon Capture

Sentencas: As a result, an absorption-based CO2 recovery process is avoided, as well as the production of large quantities of high-purity O-2, allowing a high overall thermal efficiency and essentially eliminating the energy penalty for carbon capture.
Titulo: High-Efficiency Power Production from Coal with Carbon Capture

Sentencas: (C) 2010 American Institute of Chemical Engineers AIChE J, 56: 3120-3136, 2010
Titulo: High-Efficiency Power Production from Coal with Carbon Capture
